reference.text: border constructions of opening in walls, floors or ceilings E06B1/00;

CPC-specific-text.text: electromagnetic shielding H05K9/0001

note.note-paragraph:
In this subclass, the following term is used with the meaning indicated :
- "ceiling" includes all the finishing material concealing the
the underside of the load-carrying ceiling structure or
roof structure.

The following IPC groups are not used in the CPC scheme. Subject matter covered by these groups is classified in the following CPC groups:
E04B1/682 covered by E04B1/68
E04B1/684 covered by E04B1/68
E04B1/686 covered by E04B1/68

title-part.text: Connections for building structures in general

note.note-paragraph: Connections specially adapted for particular building parts or for particular building structures are classified in the groups for those parts or structures, e.g. in groups E04B1/21, E04B2/00, E04B5/00, E04B7/00 or EO4B9/00. Joints not specially adapted for building construction, or of more general application, are classified in the appropriate subclasses, e.g. F16B.
